default.title: Fleek | Build lightning-fast apps
default.description: Fleek is an edge-optimized cloud platform. Effortlessly build, ship and scale highly performant apps. Try for free and deploy an app in 5 minutes.

blog.title: Fleek Blog
blog.description: Stay updated with blog posts from the Fleek team and community. Explore articles and insights on the latest trends and advancements in web development.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.description: Stay informed with the latest announcements from Fleek. Get insights on new features, updates, and company developments.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Keep track of all the updates and improvements on Fleek. Our changelog provides detailed information about the latest changes to our platform to help you stay ahead.

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: Explore educational content and learning resources on Fleek. Dive into tutorials, case studies, and expert advice to expand your skills and knowledge in web development.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Get started quickly with Fleek templates. Explore our collection of boilerplates and templates designed for fast build times and easy deployment.

docs.title: Fleek Docs
docs.description: Kickstart your Fleek journey with our documentation, detailed guides and references. Browse our platform resources for a deep dive into our features.

guides.title: Fleek Guides
guides.description: Discover step-by-step guides and tutorials on Fleek to streamline your app and web development. Leverage our resources to build smarter, faster, and stress free.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Fleek is an edge-optimized cloud platform. Effortlessly build, ship and scale highly performant apps. Try for free and deploy an app in 5 minutes.

support.title: Support
support.description: Visit the Fleek Support Center for detailed FAQs, troubleshooting guides, and documentation. Quickly report issues or submit support requests to get the help you need.

references.title: Fleek References
references.description: Explore the Fleek References page for troubleshooting guides designed to address common errors when using Fleek.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Visit the Fleek Billing FAQs page to find answers about payment methods, account issues, and billing cycles.

reportSite.title: Report a Site
reportSite.description: Report any site violating Fleek's Terms of Service to help maintain a secure and compliant environment.

submitRequest.title: Submit a Request
submitRequest.description: If you're encountering issues with Fleek's platform, we're here to assist! Please fill out the form with details about your issue to receive help from our support team.

annoucementMarquee.message: Introducing Fleek Functions: lightning-fast edge functions built on Fleek Networkâ€™s onchain cloud infrastructure. Read more here.

faq.question: Can I change my payment method at any time?
faq.answer: Yes. You can switch from crypto to credit card payments and any credit top-up model anytime.

faq.question: If I am in a paid/Pro plan, will I still receive the free monthly credits?
faq.answer: Yes, every user receives $5 of credits for free each month, regardless of their account type.

faq.question: What happens if I run out of credits? Will my account be suspended?
faq.answer: You will be notified before and after you run out of credits, and we will only suspend your plan after a notice period. All of your data will be saved and can be easily restored.

faq.question: What if I want to cancel my account?
faq.answer: You can stop adding credits or delete your account at any time without restrictions.
